mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(title, content, writer_id, category_id) VALUES (#{dto.title}, #{dto.content}, #{dto.writerId}, #{dto.categoryId});
mapper.select: SELECT p.content, p.created_timestamp, pa.stored_filename, pa.original_filename, pa.extension, pa.sequence FROM post p LEFT OUTER JOIN post_attachment pa ON p.id = pa.post_id WHERE p.id = #{postId} ORDER BY pa.sequence
SELECT IF(h.post_id IS NOT NULL, TRUE, FALSE) AS is_hot, view_count, comment_count FROM post p LEFT OUTER JOIN hot_post h ON p.id = h.post_id WHERE id = #{postId}
